title: Lenovo launches new Slim laptops with beautiful new designs
content:
Earlier this year at CES, Lenovo launched its 2022 Yoga convertibles. Now, it’s time for the premium clamshell lineup, which is going to be called Slim in the United States, while still being called Yoga Slim elsewhere. Basically, Lenovo is dropping IdeaPad branding from premium. Specifically, there are four laptops and an all-in-one, including the

The post Lenovo launches new Slim laptops with beautiful new designs appeared first on XDA.
description: Lenovo has announced its latest clamshall laptops, and they come with an all-new look. The Lenovo Slim 9i has a glass lid.
